name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: QuickCur 泡泡換匯 - 最快的網頁換匯工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 簡單三步驟 : 反白數字，按右鍵．選擇幣別，顯示金額泡泡
short.en: Select the number on your page, right click and show result in bubble. SUPER FAST WAY!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
★還在手動輸入金額作匯率轉換嗎?!!★
★在外國網站上購物不必手動計算匯率了!★
★簡單點兩下就完成幣別換算★

使用方法:
1. 反白數字，你甚至可以直接選取整段文字，工具會找到數字
2. 按右鍵
3. 在選單中選擇想要轉換的幣別
4. 轉換的金額會顯示在泡泡上

★在工具列上釘選，在小圖示上按右鍵點﹝選項﹞，在選單頁面上可以新增常用的幣別
v1.2.4
 - 新增評論按鈕
 - 調整選項頁面
v1.2.4
 - 修正插件更新時選單會消失的問題

v1.2.3
 - 修正新增的換匯無法使用的問題

v1.2.2
 - 優化選單，現在可以輸入文字來搜尋幣別
 - 現在可以自行調整換匯清單的順序了
 - 插件更新後不會重置換匯清單了

v1.2.1
 - 修正無法處理無逗號數字的問題
 - 新增顯示匯率在彈出視窗上的功能

v1.2.0
 - 修正無法處理百萬以上數字的問題
 - 調整彈出視窗的文字顏色

v 1.1.1
 - 修正新增幣別按鈕功能
long.en:
Quick Cur - Bubble Currency Converter
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Suffer from calculating price when shopping in foreigner website? 
Try this!
Select the number on your page, right click then select the currency mapping. Result will show in bubble. SUPER FAST WAY!

[ How To Use ]
1. Select the number on page even include other characters. This tool can read the number
2. Right Click on it
3. Choose the exchange action you want to make

★ In option page, you can create your favorite currency map!

 * v1.2.5
   * Rename the package name in Eng.
   * Add feedback page.

 * v1.2.4
   * Fix the issue that menu is gone when extension upgrades.

 * v1.2.3
   * The issue that new added exchange not working is fixed
* v1.2.2
   * A better and friendly option page allows user to find the currency. 
   * You can make your owned ordering for currency list

* v1.2.1
   * Make extractor can read number without comma
   * Enhance extractor to be able to read number when user select string with both characters and number
   * Add rate info in popup window

v1.2.0
   * Fix the issue that functionality failure which deal with number more than million.
   * Add black text color on pop-up  

v1.1.1
   * Fix the issue that adding currency button not working.
